contentrichtext.text: ==Rationale== {{Non-free use rationale| Description = British Crown | Source = Scan of coin | Article = Crown (British coin) | Portion = All | Resolution = Less than 300px in width | Purpose = Fair use in [[Crown (British coin)|British crown coin]] to illustrate a commemorative variation of the obsolete crown coin. Fair use because it doesn't prevent the UK govt from making money, is of inconsequential use on Wikipedia, and is necessary to describe the various national coats of arms and emblems. | Replaceability = No | other_information = }} {{Non-free use rationale| Description = British Crown | Source = Scan of coin | Article = Coins of the pound sterling | Portion = All | Resolution = Less than 300px in width | Purpose = Fair use in [[Coins of the pound sterling]] to illustrate a commemorative variation of the obsolete crown coin. Fair use because it doesn't prevent the UK govt from making money, is of inconsequential use on Wikipedia, and is necessary to describe the various national coats of arms and emblems. | Replaceability = No | other_information = }} ==Licensing== {{Non-free currency-UK|image has rationale=yes|circulating=no}}
